product_name: STM Glove Netbook Sleeve - Extra Small
long_description: The extra small STM Glove netbook sleeve fits like a wetsuit, providing your netbook or small laptop with sleek protection from bumps, scratches and dust. Plush lining and 3mm neoprene with a durable YKK(R) zipper swaddles your netbook. Fits most netbooks and 11 in. laptops.
short_description: The extra small STM Glove netbook sleeve fits like a wetsuit, providing your netbook or small laptop with sleek protection from bumps, scratches and dust.
